name: Work! (MXT Games)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare #44 Compo

Game about office worker, who lives in world where everyone works for LIFE.

Work to replenish your LIFE.
Your job is simple, press the button to work and earn LIFE.
Ocasionally you will get phone calls and e-mails. If you answer them, you will get bonus LIFE.
Try to reach Day 13, where small mystery awaits you.✨

- Simple FPS controls: WASD to move, mouse to look around.
- Left click to interact with buttons, and 'e' to start working.

Note: This game partially supports controller. If you manage to beat this game with controller, you can name yourself: "The Master" 😎!

Note #2: Linux build was not tested!
